scripts.install:a: cd apps/app-a && npm install && cd ./server && npm install && cd ../../../
scripts.install:b: cd apps/app-b && npm install && cd ./server && npm install && cd ../../../
scripts.install:all: npm run install:a && npm run install:b
scripts.build:a: cd apps/app-a && npm run build && cd ../../
scripts.build:b: cd apps/app-b && npm run build && cd ../../
scripts.build:all: npm run build:a && npm run build:b
scripts.preview: npm run build:all && concurrently "cd apps/app-a/server && npm run start && cd ../../" "cd apps/app-b/server && npm run start && cd ../../" "astro dev"
scripts.init:all: npm run install:all && npm run build:all
